msbt.message: Well, the year's just about over. Just one more big event to get fired up forthe Countdown! I've seen this all happen a million times before, but for some reason I still get goose bumps every time.
There's less than an hour left in the year Nothin' actually changes at midnight, but I still can't relax!
Less than an hour until the new year starts S'pose I should get started on last year's resolution!
I'm glad to see the whole island caught up in this celebration. Nothin' like an old-fashioned hootenanny!
Hey, nice hat. Looks like we're both ready to ring in the new year in style. Gahaha!
Alright—welcome to the cool hat club, kiddo!In my book, the new year doesn't even start until we're all wearin' 'em, .
Whoa, what's goin' on? You're not wearin' one of these bad boys!I'm talkin' about my hat, kiddo. Go get one so we can start this new year off right!
What's wrong with your head, kiddo? I can see the whole thing! Put one of those new-year hats on, will ya?
Already got your hat on, eh? Well, I guess you must be lookin' forward to the celebration! I can't let you one-up me. I'm gonna go get mine right now!
Ah, fiddlesticks! I wanted to be the first one walkin' around with one of those hats on. This can't stand!
Alright, now I'm good to go. Let's make this the best Countdown ever, !
Whoa, I almost forgot! Can't start the Countdown without one of these puppies.
Whoops! Neither of us has the right hat for the occasion, kiddo. Let's get 'em ready!
Now we're in business! Gotta have my fancy hat or the new year doesn't count. Gahaha!
Less than 30 minutes left now Is there anythin' you forgot to do in , kiddo? Wait, is there anythin' I forgot to do? Where's that consarned "to do" list?
Not long to go now until it's a whole new year, kiddo. Guess we should start thinkin' resolutions 'Course, I can't remember what I resolved to do THIS year.
The island sure is rockin' now, kiddo. Can you feel it? Reminds me of when I was a youngster.
It's just about time, kiddo. We've both got our hats on, so there's nothin' left to do but wait.
We're here with our hats on—let's get this thing started already!I need to get myself off to bed,
Where's your hat? You're gonna be hatless at the Countdown if you're not careful!
Not gonna wear a special hat for the occasion, eh?Ah, c'mon. Put one on as a favor to this old man!
Whoa, what happened to my hat?! The new year can't start without it!
, what am I thinking? I've gotta get that hat on my head ASAP!
Don't know what I'd do without you, kiddo. Well, actually I DO know. I would have forgotten my dang hat!
Under 30 minutes, kiddo. That means we're cleared for special hats! Better get mine on soon.
Well, look at the time. It's hat o'clock! Gahaha!
Eh? Nice, right? Now what are you waitin' for? Hat yourself up, kiddo!
Just five minutes left to write on all your checks, kiddo.<10_4 /> Whaddaya mean, "What's a check?"
Just a few minutes left now I'm barely holdin' it together, kiddo!
The Countdown is about to start and I kinda need a bathroom breakHang in there, ! We're gonna make it!
Wow, less than a minute left! You ready, ?<10_7 arg="120" />
Mere seconds until the new year begins. Here we go, kiddo!<10_7 arg="120" />

Less than an hour left until the big Countdown I expect the plaza is pretty lively by now. Nothin' wrong with some excitement, but I've been there and done that. Think I'll ring this one in from home.
Only a little while left until the Countdown. I'm sure the plaza's crammed with kiddos by now. Must be nice to have that kinda energy,
Less than an hour left in Feels like we were just doin' this yesterday. 'Course, I said the exact same thing last year, and probably the year before that. Gahaha!

Well, we've got less than 30 minutes left in the year. Unfinished business is stayin' unfinished, I'm afraid. Unless last year's resolution was, like, to do five jumpin' jacks. You could probably bang those out.
Can you believe we'll be livin' in a new year in less than 30 minutes? I'm not ready! Lemme just make a quick trip to the bathroom and the snack cupboard in the kitchen and I'll be set.
Alright, now that we're at , no more talkin' about the past. It's all future from here on out!
Less than five minutes, kiddo! You sure you don't want to be out in the plaza? I won't take offense. 'Course, you're more'n welcome to ring in the new year here with me.
The years come and the years go kinda like people. Friendships grow and fade Or maybe not. I'm not really the philosophizin' type. I'll leave that to the experts. Gahaha!
It's here, kiddo! The new year is dawnin' on !
Less than a minute to go! Let's make the next year one of the ones I'll actually remember, kiddo.<10_7 arg="120" />
You awake, ? Only a few seconds left!<10_7 arg="120" />
Giddyup! Nothin' like a sizzlin' batch of fireworks to kick the new year off right. Light 'em all up!
Even the quieter folks tend to let loose and whoop and holler on a day like todayincludin' me!
This is the only time you can cause a ruckus all night long, and I won't yell at you to get off my lawn. So, fire it up! The night's still young!
We made it! Say hello to , kiddo! Let's make this year the best on yet.
Heh, it's o'clock in the mornin', but I'm not tired at all! Feels like firecrackers are goin' off in my head!
I feel like this is gonna be our year, kiddo. It's just a vision I had in a dream
Think I might stick it out and try to catch the first sunrise of the year!Seein' a sight that rare is its own reward, but I am sorta hopin' it'll bring me good luck,
Wasn't Countdown a blast? Shoutin' out each of those last few seconds together, Felt kinda like everyone on was comin' together as one.
We're officially livin' in !<10_4 /> Now, what to do first? I'm thinkin'some kinda feast!
I hope everyone over at the plaza is havin' a good time with all the fireworks. I can even hear 'em indoorswith a pillow wrapped around my ears in the basement! Gahaha!
So, you make any New Year's resolutions for yourself, kiddo? Mine's always the same. Live a wild and crazy life! Oh, and get better at .
Whew, I'm all thirsty after that excitement. I wonder if there's still some around here
I wonder if anyone else is thinkin' what I'm thinkin'that it's too late now to go to bed.

I'm thinkin' I need a new hobby for the new year. Whaddaya think?What about ? Could you see me goin' pro at that?Gahaha! I'm just messin' with you. I'm way past the point of goin' pro at somethin' new, !
You know what time it is? It's o'clock in the dadblasted mornin'!I s'pose I just can't keep up with you youngsters the way I used to.
Well, now that the new year's here, I'm really lookin' forward to crashin' into my bed for about 14 hours. Here's hopin' I have some real wild dreams!
